'''Rhetorics of Calamitas''' is [[Mona]]'s Level 6 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When this effect is ready, a flashing blue light will appear on Mona's left wrist, and an {{Icon|Attribute Critical Hit}} icon will be displayed next to Mona's HP bar.
